mapper.sql: id, traffic_source_id, traffic_source_name, offer_id, offer_name, affiliate_network_id, affiliate_network_name, campaign_id, click_id, payout,country, p1, p2,p3,p4,p5,create_date,data_type
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_voluum_notify
id,
traffic_source_id,
traffic_source_name,
offer_id,
offer_name,
affiliate_network_id,
affiliate_network_name,
campaign_id,
click_id,
payout,
country,
p1,
p2,
p3,
p4,
p5,
create_date,
data_type,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{trafficSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{trafficSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{offerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{offerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{affiliateNetworkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{affiliateNetworkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{campaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clickId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{payout,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{p1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{p2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{p3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{p4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{p5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dataType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select:
select count(id) from t_voluum_notify where 1=1
and offer_name like '%${keyword}%'
and affiliate_network_id = '${affilicateId}'
and traffic_source_id = '${trafficId}'
and data_type = '${dataType}'

SELECT v.id, v.traffic_source_id, v.traffic_source_name, v.offer_id, v.offer_name, v.affiliate_network_id, v.affiliate_network_name, v.campaign_id, v.click_id, v.payout,b.country AS country, v.p1, v.p2,v.p3,v.p4,v.p5,v.create_date,v.data_type FROM t_voluum_notify v LEFT JOIN t_base_mcc b ON v.country = b.iso where 1=1
and offer_name like '%${keyword}%'
and affiliate_network_id = '${affilicateId}'
and traffic_source_id = '${trafficId}'
and data_type = '${dataType}'
order by create_date desc limit ${startIndex}, ${pageSize}
mapper.update: update t_voluum_notify SET data_type = 1 where click_id = #{clickId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT v.country,v.offer_id,v.offer_name,r.name_alias as offer_name_alias,v.`traffic_source_id`,v.`traffic_source_name`,COUNT(v.id) as convers_num FROM t_voluum_notify v LEFT JOIN t_config_resources r ON v.offer_id = r.voluum_offer_id WHERE v.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY v.offer_id,v.country

SELECT v.country,v.offer_id,v.offer_name,r.name_alias AS offer_name_alias,v.`affiliate_network_id`,v.`affiliate_network_name`,v.`traffic_source_id`,v.`traffic_source_name`, COUNT(v.id) AS convers_num FROM t_voluum_notify v LEFT JOIN t_config_resources r ON v.offer_id = r.voluum_offer_id WHERE v.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY v.`offer_id`,v.affiliate_network_id,v.country
